name: Mercury
desc: Mercury is the smallest planet in our solar system and is known for its short years, long days, extreme temperatures and weird sunsets.

name: Venus
desc: Venus is the second planet from the sun and has a temperature that is maintained at 462 degrees Celsius, no matter where you go on the planet.

name: Earth
desc: Earth is the third planet from the sun and is the only planet that we know of that can support life.

name: Mars
desc: Mars is the fourth planet from the sun and is the second smallest planet in the solar system.

name: Jupiter
desc: Jupiter is the fifth planet from the sun and is the largest planet in the solar system.

name: Saturn
desc: Saturn is the sixth planet from the sun and is the second largest planet in the solar system.

name: Uranus
desc: Uranus is the seventh planet from the sun and is the third largest planet in the solar system.

name: Neptune
desc: Neptune is the eighth planet from the sun and is the fourth largest planet in the solar system.
